text: Hi - does anyone have a working example of multiple cards within a single project? I canâ€™t find documentation on how to structure it :disappointed:

<@U02F2QPB4P8>

The organizing method have been kept simple in the beginning

1. You add your card's JSON file in the `/app` folder
2. Keep your serverless functions inside `/app/app.functions` folder. That's about it.
